prompt: J’ai passé un excellent week-end à la campagne avec ma famille.
reference_text: I had a great weekend in the countryside with my family.

prompt: Puoi dirmi la tua data di nascita e dove sei nato?
reference_text: Can you tell me your date or birth and where you were born?

prompt: Die ersten dokumentierten Menschen, die den Everest bestiegen haben, waren Edmund Hillary (ein Bergsteiger aus Neuseeland) und sein tibetischer Führer Tenzing Norgay. Sie bestiegen den Berg im Jahr 1953 und halten den Rekord gemeinsam.
reference_text: The first ever recorded people to climb Everest were Edmund Hillary (a mountaineer from New Zealand) and his Tibetan guide Tenzing Norgay. They climbed the mountain in 1953 and hold the record together.

prompt: La conferencia a la que asistimos ayer fue increíblemente informativa, con expertos de todo el mundo que compartieron sus conocimientos sobre tecnología emergente, y aunque algunas de las presentaciones fueron bastante técnicas, logramos entender los conceptos clave gracias a las explicaciones claras y detalladas.
reference_text: The conference we attended yesterday was incredibly informative, with experts from around the world sharing their knowledge about emerging technology, and although some of the presentations were quite technical, we managed to understand the key concepts thanks to the clear and detailed explanations.
